name: Project Ocarina
description:
Project Ocarina is a VR prototype which challenges players to solve puzzles using music. Something based on putting you on a place of Link in Zelda - Ocarina of Time.

The original idea was design to player uses an Ocarina to play notes, but you can use anything that gives a note, and even whistle and sing works on the prototype.

The project was originaly created in a Ludum Dare event, and it's currently on early stage of development. For playing the demo, use a microphone to make the same notes played.
